# Awesome Comparisons Documentation

Comprehensive documentation for Awesome Comparisons (formerly Ultimate Comparison Framework v2).

## Getting Started

- **[Overview](uc-v3/Overview.md)** - System architecture, key features, and core concepts
- **[Update YOUR Comparison](uc-v3/Update_YOUR_Comparison.md)** - Create and update datasets
- **[Migration from v2](uc-v3/Migration_From_v2.md)** - Upgrade guide

## Key Features

- **[Admin Config Interface](uc-v3/Admin_Config_Interface.md)** - Visual configuration editor at `/admin`
- **[Shared Configuration](uc-v3/Shared_Configuration.md)** - Inheritance system for reusing criteria
- **[CI & Deploy](uc-v3/CI_and_Deploy.md)** - Publishing to GitHub Pages
- **[Dynamic Repository URLs](uc-v3/Dynamic_Repository_URLs.md)** - Configure repo URLs via environment variables

## Reference

- **[FAQ](uc-v3/FAQ.md)** - Frequently asked questions
- **[Troubleshooting](uc-v3/Troubleshooting.md)** - Common problems and solutions

## Quick Navigation

**New users:** [Overview](uc-v3/Overview.md) → [Update YOUR Comparison](uc-v3/Update_YOUR_Comparison.md)
**Migrating from v2:** [Migration Guide](uc-v3/Migration_From_v2.md) → [Overview](uc-v3/Overview.md)
**Need help:** [FAQ](uc-v3/FAQ.md) → [Troubleshooting](uc-v3/Troubleshooting.md)

## What's New

v3 introduces breaking changes. See [Overview](uc-v3/Overview.md#whats-new) for details:
- Multi-dataset support
- Visual config editor (`/admin`)
- Shared criteria & groupings
- TypeScript converter (no Java)
- Dataset-aware builds

- **Legacy v2 docs**: `uc-v2/` (archived)

- **Blueprint**: `../BLUEPRINT.md` (inheritance details)
